title: sutantara murasam
sahitya:
sutantara murasam cidambaram piLLai tUttukkuDi vIran


anupallavi

  madam tarum anniya mAyattai OTTiya mantravAdi mA perum tyAgi


caraNam    bhArati pATTukkup-pallavi avanE bAla gangAdharan valakkaram avanE
ghOra siraiyir sekkizhuttavanE koDumai tAngik-koDi piDittAnE
sudEshik-kappal viTTavan avanE tuNinda vIram aNindavan avanE
sadA tirukkuraL sAdhanai purindAn tamizhaga maNigaLiLE migha sirandavan
